text: allah pavitra grham ayina ka'abah nu manavajati koraku, suraksitamaina santi nilayanga (baitul haram ga) cesadu. Mariyu pavitra masanni mariyu bali (had ya) pasuvulanu mariyu medalalo pattalu vesi ka'abah ku khurbani koraku tebade pasuvulanu (khala idalanu) kuda niyamincadu. Idi akasalalonu maruya bhumilonu unnadanta niscayanga, allah erugunani, miru telusukovalani! Mariyu niscayanga allah ku prati okka visayam gurinci baga telusu
